page_content: string (short narrative paragraph in English or French depending on the language passed in argument)

metadata.title: string (title of the lore entry)
metadata.theme: string (main narrative or conceptual theme, e.g. 'cosmology', 'faith', 'magic')
metadata.language: 'en' or 'fr' depending on the language passed in argument
metadata.world: string (name of the world this lore is tied to)
metadata.region: string (name of the in-world region or location this lore is tied to)
metadata.visible_in_game: boolean (whether the player can access this directly)
